com.esri.mo2.client.io
Interface StatelessChannel

public interface StatelessChannel

This interface implements a short-lived object created by a ServiceProxy for providing a state-less communication link to an IMS service. It provides an OutputStream for writing data requests to, and an InputStream for reading the results of the request.

Only one request can be made, and the StatelessChannel should be discarded after the results are obtained. The results are undefined if you get a result stream without first opening a request stream and sending an appropriate request.

See Also:
ServerProxy

Method Summary
 InputStream getInputStream()
          Opens an InputStream to the service in order to obtain results from a previous request.
 OutputStream getOutputStream()
          Opens an OutputStream to the service in order to send a request.
 InputStream getSecureInputStream()
          Returns the InputStream for receiving encrypted responses from the Application Server.
 EsrimapSecureOutputStream getSecureOutputStream()
          Returns the OutputStream for sending encrypted requests to the Application Server with a username and password in encrypted from as well.
 

Method Detail

getOutputStream

public OutputStream getOutputStream()
                             throws IOException
Opens an OutputStream to the service in order to send a request. You must write the request data and close the stream, before attempting to open the result InputStream

Returns:
the request stream
Throws:
IOException - if an error accurs when trying to open the OutputStream
See Also:
getInputStream()

getInputStream

public InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
Opens an InputStream to the service in order to obtain results from a previous request. You must get a request stream and write the request to the service before trying to get the result stream.

Returns:
the result stream
Throws:
IOException - if an error occurs when trying to open the InputStream
See Also:
getOutputStream()

getSecureOutputStream

public EsrimapSecureOutputStream getSecureOutputStream()
                                                throws IOException
Returns the OutputStream for sending encrypted requests to the Application Server with a username and password in encrypted from as well.

IOException

getSecureInputStream

public InputStream getSecureInputStream()
                                 throws IOException
Returns the InputStream for receiving encrypted responses from the Application Server.

IOException
